moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.description: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.

moves.name: Freeze-Dry
moves.description: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

moves.name: Weather Ball
moves.description: An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather.

moves.name: Icicle Spear
moves.description: The user launches sharp icicles at the target. It strikes two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also reduces the targets' Speed stat.

moves.name: Mist
moves.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

moves.name: Avalanche
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Mirror Shot
moves.description: The user looses a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Acid Armor
moves.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

moves.name: Hail
moves.description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

moves.name: Mirror Coat
moves.description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.

moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.description: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.
